content.question: In 2018, a large number of migrants from Afghanistan and Iraq applied for asylum in the European Union. Which of the following is a pull factor that explains this migration?

choices.label: A high rate of natural increase in the Middle East, leading to overpopulation
Armed conflict, driving many people from their home regions in the Middle East
Drought and food shortages in the Middle East, leading many people to search for food security
Immigration reforms and fenced borders around Europe, controlling the flow of migrant workers
Economic growth and employment opportunities in Europe, attracting immigrant workers

content.answer: Economic growth and employment opportunities in Europe, attracting immigrant workers
